languages.text: {n}...обрывок меха, в котором вы безошибочно угадываете кусок из плаща Ульфара. Интересно, что бы сказал про проказу ворона сам великан-астартес, застань он птицу за воровством?{/n}
{n}...a scrap of fur, unmistakably from Ulfar's cloak. You find yourself wondering what the mighty Astartes would have had to say about {petname}'s antics had he caught the thief in the act.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}...обрывок меха, в котором вы безошибочно угадываете кусок из плаща Ульфара. Интересно, что бы сказал про проказу ворона сам великан-астартес, застань он птицу за воровством?{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}...a scrap of fur, which unmistakably came from Ulfar's cloak. You find yourself wondering what the mighty Astartes would have had to say about {petname}'s antics had he caught the thief in the act.{/n}

languages.text: {n}…明らかにウルファーの外套からちぎられたものに違いない毛皮の切れ端だ。あの偉大なアスタルテスが{petname}のいたずらをその場で目撃していたなら、どんな反応をしただろうかと、ふと想像してしまう。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}...a scrap of fur, unmistakably from Ulfar's cloak. You find yourself wondering what the mighty Astartes would have had to say about {petname}'s antics had he caught the thief in the act.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}…明らかにウルファーの外套からちぎられたものに違いない毛皮の切れ端だ。あの偉大なアスタルテスが{petname}のいたずらをその場で目撃していたなら、どんな反応をしただろうかと、ふと想像してしまう。{/n}

languages.text: {n}... ein Stück Fell, zweifellos von Ulfars Umhang. Du fragst dich, was der mächtige Astartes wohl zu den Possen von {petname} gesagt hätte, hätte er den Dieb auf frischer Tat ertappt.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}...a scrap of fur, unmistakably from Ulfar's cloak. You find yourself wondering what the mighty Astartes would have had to say about {petname}'s antics had he caught the thief in the act.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}... ein Stück Fell, zweifellos von Ulfars Umhang. Du fragst dich, was der mächtige Astartes wohl zu den Possen von {petname} gesagt hätte, hätte er den Dieb auf frischer Tat ertappt.{/n}

languages.text: {n}... une touffe de fourrure provenant de la cape d'Ulfar. Vous vous demandez comment le puissant Astartes aurait réagi s'il avait surpris {petname} en plein larcin.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}...a scrap of fur, unmistakably from Ulfar's cloak. You find yourself wondering what the mighty Astartes would have had to say about {petname}'s antics had he caught the thief in the act.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}... une touffe de fourrure provenant de la cape d'Ulfar. Vous vous demandez comment le puissant Astartes aurait réagi s'il avait surpris {petname} en plein larcin.{/n}

languages.text: {n}... un trozo de tela forrada de piel que sin duda pertenece a la capa de Ulfar. Te preguntas qué habría dicho el poderoso Astartes de las travesuras de {petname} si hubiese pillado al ladrón en el acto.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}...a scrap of fur, unmistakably from Ulfar's cloak. You find yourself wondering what the mighty Astartes would have had to say about {petname}'s antics had he caught the thief in the act.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}... un trozo de tela forrada de piel que sin duda pertenece a la capa de Ulfar. Te preguntas qué habría dicho el poderoso Astartes de las travesuras de {petname} si hubiese pillado al ladrón en el acto.{/n}

languages.text: {n}……那是一小块毛皮，肯定是从乌尔法的斗篷上扯下来的。你不禁在想，如果那位强大的星际战士抓住了{petname}，他会对这个小偷的滑稽行为作何评论。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}...a scrap of fur, unmistakably from Ulfar's cloak. You find yourself wondering what the mighty Astartes would have had to say about {petname}'s antics had he caught the thief in the act.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}……那是一小块毛皮，肯定是从乌尔法的斗篷上扯下来的。你不禁在想，如果那位强大的星际战士抓住了{petname}，他会对这个小偷的滑稽行为作何评论。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Bariz Ulfar'ın pelerininden sökülmüş bir kürk parçası. Hırsızı iş üstünde yakalasa, kudretli Astartes'in bu konuda ne diyeceğini düşünmeden edemiyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}...a scrap of fur, unmistakably from Ulfar's cloak. You find yourself wondering what the mighty Astartes would have had to say about {petname}'s antics had he caught the thief in the act.{/n}
